workflow_description: 1. Handle Popup: Dismiss any newsletter/subscription popups. 2. Search: Use search function to find 'Dyson V15 Detect' and navigate to product page. 3. PDP Verification: On product detail page, verify 'Add to Bag' or 'Add to Cart' button is visible and enabled. 4. Add to Cart: Click the add-to-cart button (may say 'Add to Bag'), wait for cart drawer/modal to appear. 5. Cart Verification: In the cart drawer, find and click 'Checkout', 'Proceed to Checkout', or 'Secure Checkout' button. 6. Final Verification: Confirm we land on checkout page (URL contains '/checkout').
